data.text: @EU_Commission Your repudiation of those people who challenge/criticise you by referring to them as a mob....is verging on psychotic.

@EU_Commission Mad Bastards. But Loveley People.....

@EU_Commission Good morning, USA & entire world are well known that Pakistan is rogue & Terrorist heaven country. Western countries knows very well that whatever funds r giving to Pakistan is using to promote terrorists against India.

@EU_Commission Thanks for calling us a "mob". You will see that mob during the demonstrations. No one ever said the #CopyrightDirective itself is bad. And no, we are not disinformed, the text was even analyzed by lawyers and they say there are a lot of problems with it.
@EU_Commission Commission loves EU because gives gives them overpaid jobs, plush offices, expense accounts long holidays, unsackable, unaccountable to voters #Valentines
@EU_Commission Meanwhile the Catalonian secessionist Puigdemont was going to have his ego further inflated by some group of the EU Parliament...
@EU_Commission Great explanation

@EU_Commission So the @EU_Commission writes a blog post explaining how citizens are not smart enough to have an opinion on the #CopyrightDirective. Really!? Quoting yourself: Cui Bono? Whose money did you take? @jyrkikatainen what are you and your pals up to?
@EU_Commission Do you really think someone still might believe you?
@EU_Commission @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @NatBruxelles Yeah no the text talks clear. This Is Not good
@EU_Commission The Dragon has done nothing. You're threatening him. It's like threatening an innocent man.
@EU_Commission Let's hope Brexit happens and that it doesn't stop at the UK.
@EU_Commission @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @NatBruxelles And what about independent musicians like myself?
@EU_Commission "facts"
@EU_Commission stoppen Sie diese Totalität, wir sind nicht in der Sowjetunion, die die EU aus den ganzen Schafen gemacht hat! danke
@EU_Commission Delete the EU.
@EU_Commission Boo! You suck! Boooo!
@EU_Commission You're ruining the internet for all of us on this planet. The EU should have been the last place to create internet filters, not the first...
@EU_Commission @LIFEprogramme @EU_ENV @EU_EASME @KarmenuVella @Greenden_Italy

@EU_Commission Of course! Because everytime we ask specific questions all we get is silence or it's to be established later with copyright holders in a base of mutual understanding. 
So... #saveyourinternet and stop the madness, please?
@EU_Commission Viva l’Europa , Morte all’unione europea!
@EU_Commission "For those of you, who don’t know nor care about what the Copyright  Directive is nor any of the articles within it, look away now." WAT.
@EU_Commission Please delete article 11 & 13.
@EU_Commission EU= new SSSR, bastard!!
@EU_Commission This is going to ruin many startups.

@EU_Commission @EUErasmusPlus @TNavracsicsEU This Erasmus thing - isn't it a junket for middle-class students at tax-payers' expense? And seeing as white working-class youth are seen as more xenophobic than their middle-class compatriots, shouldn't  they take priority for any horizon-widening experience?
@EU_Commission 👍🏼

@EU_Commission The article amounts to little more than shameful and condescending PR. Honestly, it mostly revolves around your intentions and not actual consequences. You even allege the campaigns against the Copyright Directive were disingenuous ("paid-for", "Cui Bono?"). WTF?

@EU_Commission You live in a different reality.

The internet will give you the finger and work around it. 🖕
@EU_Commission I AM STILL IN THE RACE VICTORY IS SURE NO DECEPTION WILL WORK@NatashaAkpoti #Natashasituationrm2019
@EU_Commission @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @DSMeu @NatBruxelles You are the shame of whole Europe. This isn't the Europe of people's is the Europe of companies!!!!
@EU_Commission Yes yes, and who cares if economies are dropping and some. EU countries are poorer now than 20 years ago: we have the Erasmus. 🙄

@EU_Commission Asking myself: Who benefits? Large music labels, old-style publishers that forgot to digitalize. Who looses? Small, independent publishers and music labels, young artists. Well done! How to alienate people even more from the EU #saveyourinternet
@EU_Commission Well done EU. Making laws that the people don't want. What a success. Morons.
@EU_Commission Everybody under the age of 40: Am I a joke to you?
@EU_Commission Don't make me laugh it's about rightholder money, not speech. If anything all you'll do with that directive is encourage people to go underground.
@EU_Commission @Ansip_EU @GabrielMariya @DSMeu Call it whatever you like. But we know this is censorship.

@EU_Commission You are enforcing censorship.
It is you who spread misinformation.
We will no longer be able to share information freely. It is time to act people.

#censorship #StopACTA2 #Article13

@EU_Commission @LIFEprogramme @EU_ENV @EU_EASME @KarmenuVella Are you going to conserve freedom of speech too?

#StopACTA2 #censorship

@EU_Commission We will remember #censorship and #Article13 during elections.

#StopACTA2 #acta2 #SaveYourInternet  #SaveTheInternet
@EU_Commission With this EU members will become 3rd world countries in terms of the Internet.
@EU_Commission Big yikes
@EU_Commission The problem is not our desinformation, the problem is the corruption in eu commision.
@EU_Commission If we have an extension to A50 or better still #RevokeA50 I will vote to #StopFacism

@EU_Commission #NEXIT 
#StemZeWeg

@EU_Commission Non ce la fate proprio a capire? Non vi vogliamo, non siamo europei, non avete fatto altro che succhiare il sangue ed impoverire le nazioni imponendo le vostre direttive. Via! Fuori dal nostro paese!
@EU_Commission This is a prime example of being out of touch.
@EU_Commission I am a web developer. How can I - roughly speaking - "ensure the unavailability of specific works" on a system where users can contribute their own content? Paint me a picture.

@EU_Commission please tell me whom should I send my issue with the Italian consulate in Freiburg i.B. I have been working as a legal translator for German Italian for over 20 years and now he wants to delete my name from the list since I live on the French German border. Pls HLP

@EU_Commission Ok listen up EU , Article 13 is a bad thing not a good thing people will lose there jobs if this happens , I understand that it's a copyright law but it a really hrash and really bad it's has alot of cons and alot a people against #Article13

@EU_Commission LOL. It is a known fact that EU politicians get their ass licked by lobbyists while being paid by the people they should actually speak for. 
Fuck off with that bullshit.
@EU_Commission And what about a TDM regime to push innovation and commercial analytics?

@EU_Commission You people have no idea what you are talking about, those rules aren’t even remotely fit for the digital age! WAKE UP and realise this is only about money and not the benefit of everyone else before this is too late.
@EU_Commission You have to stop filtering and censoring the internet
@EU_Commission Also, you and the #Article13 supporters are the ones spreading disinformation. Stop it.
@EU_Commission These are a bunch of lies. #Article13 needs to be stopped. Quit fucking spreading propaganda you fucking liars.
@EU_Commission With this kind of law, you support the far rights. So sad.
@EU_Commission Who's paying for these shameless propaganda bits?
@EU_Commission Don't try to sell me a bag of fecal matter and tell me it's a bag of gold.
@EU_Commission No. All but lobbyists are hoping it doesn't pass. Stop promoting disinformation.

@EU_Commission I can hear Pewdiepie scream "The EU did an oopsie!"
This new copyright law is impossible to fulfill IRL and Upload filters are the only option to just try to fulfill it. And Upload Filters cannot see a context allowing the usage of copyright protected things.
@EU_Commission It is funny that you complain about phrases as link tax when your entire article 13 proposal built on the "value gap" myth created by the copyright industry.

@EU_Commission Modern rules? "Really?"
The more I read about this new copyright, the more alamic it is.
How can one describe such a law as modern?
It's not fair anyway.
For example, someone can simply blame/claime someone without fear of punishment.
@EU_Commission Just scroll down the comments of this tweet and you will get a pretty clear idea what people think about your new "Rules"...
@EU_Commission the copyrightdirective is a disaster. i want a swexit.
@EU_Commission 372 likes - 372 people eager to get censored.

@EU_Commission "Enhanced rights for users", "strenghtened cultural sector"....

Are you making fun of yourself or are you serious? This is literally doing the opposite by strengthening big corporations and hurting the individual creator, all while calling the opposition uninformed criminals.
@EU_Commission Well the internet was nice while it lasted I'm going back to living in a cave
@EU_Commission The end of the EU is near. This just speeds it up a little bit.
@EU_Commission Traitors.
@EU_Commission All I hear from there mouths is censorship.

@EU_Commission @BrexitBin most misinformation came and comes from you guys. I wonder, whether any of you have ever really used a search engine???
What next? Make me pay, if I walk past a newsagent and see the headline? Were does the ambition come from to join Russia and China in killing the internet?
@EU_Commission ALDE!!!!!!
@EU_Commission Because you have GROS GROS salaires payés sur le dos des peuples européens.
@EU_Commission Ne riparliamo a Maggio

@EU_Commission The EU is wonderful at claiming the achievements of others.
'Peace in Europe'.... er.... no - that was the Allied war effort and NATO
'Workers rights'.... er...no... we had them for decades before the EU emerged
'visa free travel'.... we had that under the EEC

@EU_Commission I love FREXIT, parce que j'aime la paix, le respect du peuple, mon pays, vivre et travailler dans mon pays , que mon travail et ma retraite soit reconnus, les services publics français. Française j'aime la France, j'aime l'Europe, je déteste l'UE!

@EU_Commission @BrexitBin Sorry, aber das ist Unfug! Wer das verfasst hat, hat Null Ahnung von moderner Technologienutzung oder will Europa im globalen Wettbewerb torpedieren. Von solchen Unsinn kommt der Eindruck der Realitaetsferne, der die Europaverdrossenheit fördert. cc @peteraltmaier @katarinabarley
@EU_Commission That all sounds nice and dandy until you read the actual text of the proposed directive which is just horrible broad and vague and will strangle freedom of expression and creativity.

@EU_Commission Whoever politician votes for this censorship, the young people of Europe will not forget it in the upcoming European elections.

Many millions are already aware of this. They wont forget it.

@EU_Commission I've read the article and boy does it paint you bad. You clearly state that copyright directive is aimed against Google & Facebook + giving $ to journalists. G&F=bad, EU=good. OK I get it, but to quote you Cui Bono? Right holder groups and large journo-orgs, certainly not users.

@EU_Commission I would love the EU

.... it followed its own laws (Mr Selmayr + double standards for France & Italy
... it had constitution and structure like the USA
... power was accountable to the voters
